title: The Quran: English Meanings and Notes
description: First published in 1997, this translation of the Quran has received outstanding reviews for its accuracy, style and simplified English. Its 2,000 footnotes and supplemental subject index are beneficial additions. It has been highly recommended by notable personalities such as Sheik Yusuf Estes, Dr. Zakir Naik, Dr. Sabeel Ahmed, Imam Siraj Wahaj and Dr. Bilal Philips.
author: Saheeh International
